div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:

description.value: CCC DAK

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

name.value: Ability to work offline and in low-bandwidth areas

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – hardware and connectivity Ability to work offline and in low-bandwidth areas

name.value: Accept data from multiple input methods including paper and geocoding (global positioning system)

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – interoperability Accept data from multiple input methods including paper and geocoding (global positioning system)

name.value: Add data that provide socio-demographic information about the client

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Add data that provide socio-demographic information about the client so that >I can use the data to for analysis, forecasting and planning

name.value: Adhere to complex password requirements

description.value: *Category*: Security – authentication Adhere to complex password requirements

name.value: Adjust display to fit small screens (such as mobile phones)

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – usability Adjust display to fit small screens (such as mobile phones)

name.value: Alert the user when navigating away from the form without saving

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – usability Alert the user when navigating away from the form without saving

name.value: All Users

description.value: Actor All Users from Function Requirements

name.value: Allow admin user to request password reset

description.value: *Category*: Security – user management Allow admin user to request password reset

name.value: Allow cascading user management and assignment of roles

description.value: *Category*: Security – user management Allow cascading user management and assignment of roles

name.value: Allow each user to be assigned to one or more roles

description.value: *Category*: Security – user management Allow each user to be assigned to one or more roles

name.value: Allow edits to fields on screen before information is committed

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Allow edits to fields on screen before information is committed so that >I can ensure information has been checked before submission

name.value: Allow edits to fields on screen before information is committed

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Allow edits to fields on screen before information is committed so that >I can ensure information has been checked before submission

name.value: Allow for a temporary identification in emergency situations when full identity is unknown

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Allow for a temporary identification in emergency situations when full identity is unknown so that >I can proceed with registration

name.value: Allow for a temporary identification in emergency situations when full identity is unknown

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Allow for a temporary identification in emergency situations when full identity is unknown so that >I can proceed with registration

name.value: Allow for data exchange and efficient synchronization across multiple facilities and points of service when the Internet is available, even when it is intermittent and slow

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – hardware and connectivity Allow for data exchange and efficient synchronization across multiple facilities and points of service when the Internet is available, even when it is intermittent and slow

name.value: Allow for offline and online functionality

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – general Allow for offline and online functionality

name.value: Allow roles to be associated with specific geographical areas and/or health facilities (with the ability to choose which facility to log into as the user may work across several facilities)

description.value: *Category*: Security – user management Allow roles to be associated with specific geographical areas and/or health facilities (with the ability to choose which facility to log into as the user may work across several facilities)

name.value: Allow the recording of key observations during a visit and a space to make general notes about the consultation and treatment provided

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Allow the recording of key observations during a visit and a space to make general notes about the consultation and treatment provided so that >I can ensure that the client's health information is recorded and kept up to date

name.value: Allow the recording of key observations during the follow-up visit

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Allow the recording of key observations during the follow-up visit so that >I can ensure the client's health information is recorded and kept up to date

name.value: Allow user to change the user's own password

description.value: *Category*: Security – user management Allow user to change the user's own password

name.value: Allow user with permission to create a new user and temporary password

description.value: *Category*: Security – user management Allow user with permission to create a new user and temporary password

name.value: Allow users to enable and disable another user

description.value: *Category*: Security – user management Allow users to enable and disable another user

name.value: Anonymize data that are exported from the system when required (also ability to export non-anonymized data from the system)

description.value: *Category*: Security – confidentiality Anonymize data that are exported from the system when required (also ability to export non-anonymized data from the system)

name.value: Automated system notification

description.value: Actor Automated system notification from Function Requirements

name.value: Automatically log out the user after specified time of inactivity

description.value: *Category*: Security – confidentiality Automatically log out the user after specified time of inactivity

name.value: Be able to accommodate at least 3000 health facilities

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – scalability Be able to accommodate at least 3000 health facilities

name.value: Be able to accommodate at least 5000 concurrent users

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – scalability Be able to accommodate at least 5000 concurrent users

name.value: Be able to accommodate more than [x number of] concurrent users

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – scalability Be able to accommodate more than [x number of] concurrent users

name.value: Be able to build the type of solution suitable for my country/setting using the correct modules according to preferences

description.value: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Be able to build the type of solution suitable for my country/setting using the correct modules according to preferences so that >I can build the solution as closely as possible to the country/setting according to regulations within the country and according to our specific solution requirements

name.value: Be able to differentiate between simple and complex care provision requirements

description.value: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Be able to differentiate between simple and complex care provision requirements so that >I can provide the correct level of detail for the user type (e.g. doctor/specialist vs nurse health workers)

name.value: Be able to edit the identification information (including information pertaining to the client's caregiver)

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Be able to edit the identification information (including information pertaining to the client's caregiver) so that >I can update existing client information

name.value: Be able to enter new identification information (including information pertaining to the client's caregiver)

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Be able to enter new identification information (including information pertaining to the client's caregiver) so that >I can enter new client information

name.value: Be able to find out where a treatment method may be available nearby

description.value: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Be able to find out where a treatment method may be available nearby  so that >I can refer my client to another facility to receive the appropriate services

name.value: Be able to gather the client's caregiver basic information (if required)

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Be able to gather the client's caregiver basic information (if required) so that >I can track and follow the name of the client's caregiver for the purposes of engagement during the consultation

name.value: Be able to gather unique identifier number/information pertaining to the client that does not include personal information

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Be able to gather unique identifier number/information pertaining to the client that does not include personal information so that >I do not have to manage personal information management regulations/laws

name.value: Be able to gather unique identifier number/information pertaining to the client that includes personal information

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Be able to gather unique identifier number/information pertaining to the client that includes personal information so that >I can identify the client using personal information within personal information management regulations/laws

name.value: Be able to input biometric information only (e.g. age, sex, respiration, weight, birthweight, height)

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Be able to input biometric information only (e.g. age, sex, respiration, weight, birthweight, height) so that >I can proceed without using personal information but still maintain medical information via a unique identifier number (also useful in emergency scenarios)

name.value: Be able to know the care my client received at the referral facility

description.value: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker, I want to: >Be able to know the care my client received at the referral facility  so that >I can provide appropriate care if my client comes back to my facility

name.value: Be able to provide feedback to the facility administrator/IT administrator for issues users notice through daily use of the tool and recommended solution improvements.

description.value: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Be able to provide feedback to the facility administrator/IT administrator for issues users notice through daily use of the tool and recommended solution improvements. so that >Future solution development can be improved for the users

name.value: Be able to run calculations on data to populate indicators or reports on my own performance and service delivery – calculations on data should be conducted with Fast Health Interoperability Resources (FHIR) and contextual query language

description.value: *Business process* (F) Aggregate Reporting: As a Facility staff, facility staff in charge, district health officer/staff, I want to: >Be able to run calculations on data to populate indicators or reports on my own performance and service delivery – calculations on data should be conducted with Fast Health Interoperability Resources (FHIR) and contextual query language so that >I can understand trends and challenges and track my own performance over time

name.value: Be able to share my client’s health records with the follow-up facility

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Be able to share my client’s health records with the follow-up facility  so that >They can provide the care my client needs

name.value: Be able to share my client’s health records with the referral facility

description.value: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker, I want to: >Be able to share my client’s health records with the referral facility  so that >They can provide the health care my client needs

name.value: Be able to show improvements or decline of a client's health based on previous/current consultations including before and after treatment

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Be able to show improvements or decline of a client's health based on previous/current consultations including before and after treatment so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

name.value: Be able to start a new Business Process B: Assess and classify the sick child if new symptoms have been identified with the client

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Be able to start a new Business Process B: Assess and classify the sick child if new symptoms have been identified with the client so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

name.value: Be able to track treatments via reference numbers so that these can be updated as required and can be used to create "treatment modules" pertinent to a country or emergency setting

description.value: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Be able to track treatments via reference numbers so that these can be updated as required and can be used to create \"treatment modules\" pertinent to a country or emergency setting so that >Countries can implement the correct treatment module for their regulations and emergency setting

name.value: Be able to view data on my own performance and service delivery

description.value: *Business process* (F) Aggregate Reporting: As a Facility staff, facility staff in charge, district health officer/staff, I want to: >Be able to view data on my own performance and service delivery   so that >I can understand trends and challenges and track my own performance over time

name.value: Be able to view the age of the client on the client record or after consultation with the caregiver to add the client's age to the record

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Be able to view the age of the client on the client record or after consultation with the caregiver to add the client's age to the record so that >I can provide appropriate services for the client's problems based on their age

name.value: Be designed to be flexible enough to accommodate for the necessary changes in the future

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – general Be designed to be flexible enough to accommodate for the necessary changes in the future

name.value: Be interoperable with external systems through mediators

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – interoperability Be interoperable with external systems through mediators

name.value: Be reliable and robust (minimize the number of system crashes)

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – usability Be reliable and robust (minimize the number of system crashes)

name.value: Be user-friendly for people with low computer literacy

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – usability Be user-friendly for people with low computer literacy

name.value: Bypass the standard flow at any point if an urgent case is identified – Refer to Business Process G. Triage and assessment

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Bypass the standard flow at any point if an urgent case is identified – Refer to Business Process G. Triage and assessment so that >The child/infant can receive immediate attention – Refer to Business Process G. Triage and assessment

name.value: Communicate with external systems through mediators

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – interoperability Communicate with external systems through mediators

name.value: Community health worker

description.value: Actor Community health worker from Function Requirements

name.value: Configure business rules in line with guidelines and standard operating procedures (using the decision logic and contextual query language [CQL] + Fast Health Interoperability Resources [FHIR])

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – configuration Configure business rules in line with guidelines and standard operating procedures (using the decision logic and contextual query language [CQL] + Fast Health Interoperability Resources [FHIR])

name.value: Configure error messages

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – configuration Configure error messages

name.value: Configure the system centrally

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – configuration Configure the system centrally

name.value: Configure workflows and business rules to accommodate differences between facilities

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – configuration Configure workflows and business rules to accommodate differences between facilities

name.value: Create a new follow-up request to the health facility

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Create a new follow-up request to the health facility so that >I can refer my client so that they receive the appropriate services

name.value: Create a new follow-up request to the health facility

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Create a new follow-up request to the health facility so that >I can refer my client so that they receive the appropriate services

name.value: Create a new referral request to the health facility

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Create a new referral request to the health facility so that >I can refer my client so that they receive the appropriate services

name.value: Create a new referral request to the health facility

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Create a new referral request to the health facility so that >I can refer my client so that they receive the appropriate services

name.value: Determine whether to manage client at the facility or refer

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Determine whether to manage client at the facility or refer so that >I can ensure the client receives appropriate services as quickly as possible

name.value: Display a schedule of available days

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Display a schedule of available days so that >I can notify client when to return for subsequent contact

name.value: Display a schedule of available days

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Display a schedule of available days so that >I can notify the client when to return for subsequent contact

name.value: Display sufficient data to identify the client

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Display sufficient data to identify the client so that >I can confirm that it is the correct client

name.value: Display the number of existing contacts per day (to allow for balancing)

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Display the number of existing contacts per day (to allow for balancing) so that >I can manage and follow up on clients requiring services

name.value: Easy to learn and intuitive to enable user to navigate between pages

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – usability Easy to learn and intuitive to enable user to navigate between pages

name.value: Edit data that provide socio-demographic information about the client

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Edit data that provide socio-demographic information about the client so that >I can use the data to for analysis, forecasting and planning

name.value: Enable deployment in an environment subject to power loss

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – general Enable deployment in an environment subject to power loss

name.value: Enable earlier versions of a record to be recoverable

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – general Enable earlier versions of a record to be recoverable

name.value: Enable use via a Web interface and mobile applications for use on various technology devices such as computers, laptops, tablets and mobiles

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – hardware and connectivity Enable use via a Web interface and mobile applications for use on various technology devices such as computers, laptops, tablets and mobiles

name.value: Exchange data with other approved systems

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – interoperability Exchange data with other approved systems

name.value: Facility health worker

description.value: Actor Facility health worker from Function Requirements

name.value: Facility staff, facility staff in charge, district health officer/staff

description.value: Actor Facility staff, facility staff in charge, district health officer/staff from Function Requirements

name.value: Find facilities that can provide the service or treatment method that mine cannot provide.

description.value: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Find facilities that can provide the service or treatment method that mine cannot provide.  so that >The client does not travel to a facility that cannot help them

name.value: Functional Requirement Categories

description.value: Value Set for Functional Requirements Categories. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

name.value: Functional Requirement Categories

description.value: CodeSystem for Functional Requirements Categories. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

name.value: Functional Requirements - Business Process

description.value: ValueSet of Functional Requirements - Business Process

name.value: Functional Requirements - Business Process

description.value: ValueSet of Functional Requirements - Business Process

name.value: Generate analysis of the usage of different system features and reports

description.value: *Category*: Security – audit trail and logs Generate analysis of the usage of different system features and reports

name.value: Generate IDs that are unique across different installations or sites

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – general Generate IDs that are unique across different installations or sites

name.value: Have ability to easily back up information

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – general Have ability to easily back up information

name.value: Health worker

description.value: Actor Health worker from Function Requirements

name.value: Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver)

description.value: Actor Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver) from Function Requirements

name.value: Health worker or clerk

description.value: Actor Health worker or clerk from Function Requirements

name.value: Highlight abnormal values

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Highlight abnormal values so that >I can identify critical health issues or errors (if a data entry issue)

name.value: Highlight abnormal values

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Highlight abnormal values so that >I can identify critical health issues or errors (if a data entry issue)

name.value: Identify in the client's record if this is a follow-up appointment or an initial visit

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Identify in the client's record if this is a follow-up appointment or an initial visit so that >I can identify which process to follow and view the client's previous problems that required a follow-up

name.value: Identify key symptoms and signs that may require medical attention

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Identify key symptoms and signs that may require medical attention so that >I can provide the appropriate services as quickly as possible

name.value: Identify the date of the last attended contact

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Identify the date of the last attended contact so that >I can ensure client is receiving services according to the recommended contact schedule

name.value: Indicate (based on protocol) the preferred days for follow-up contact

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Indicate (based on protocol) the preferred days for follow-up contact so that >The client receives services according to the recommended contact schedule

name.value: Indicate (based on the protocol) the preferred days for follow-up contact

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Indicate (based on the protocol) the preferred days for follow-up contact so that >The client receives services according to recommended contact schedule

name.value: Indicate if the age of the child is not known and be able to provide information as to how an age determination has been agreed

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Indicate if the age of the child is not known and be able to provide information as to how an age determination has been agreed so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

name.value: Indicate mandatory fields that must be filled out for the registration to be valid

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Indicate mandatory fields that must be filled out for the registration to be valid so that >I can ensure all necessary information has been completed

name.value: Indicate mandatory fields that must be filled out for the registration to be valid

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Indicate mandatory fields that must be filled out for the registration to be valid so that >I can ensure all necessary information has been completed

name.value: Indicate that the patient has arrived for the initial visit, scheduled contact or specific complaint (tasks will vary based on health worker roles)

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Indicate that the patient has arrived for the initial visit, scheduled contact or specific complaint (tasks will vary based on health worker roles) so that >I can know what services to provide

name.value: Link with insurance systems to verify eligibility and submit claims

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – interoperability Link with insurance systems to verify eligibility and submit claims

name.value: Lock a user out after a specified number of wrong password attempts

description.value: *Category*: Security – authentication Lock a user out after a specified number of wrong password attempts

name.value: Log access to data summaries, reports, analysis and visualization features

description.value: *Category*: Security – audit trail and logs Log access to data summaries, reports, analysis and visualization features

name.value: Log access to views of individual client records

description.value: *Category*: Security – audit trail and logs Log access to views of individual client records

name.value: Log all activities performed by the user, including date and time stamp

description.value: *Category*: Security – audit trail and logs Log all activities performed by the user, including date and time stamp

name.value: Log all data and system errors

description.value: *Category*: Security – audit trail and logs Log all data and system errors

name.value: Log exchange of data with other systems

description.value: *Category*: Security – audit trail and logs Log exchange of data with other systems

name.value: Log system log-ins and log-outs

description.value: *Category*: Security – audit trail and logs Log system log-ins and log-outs

name.value: Manage clinical algorithm guidance changes through a change management process with quality assurance (using a reference system) and be able to push the information out to all solutions in use

description.value: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Manage clinical algorithm guidance changes through a change management process with quality assurance (using a reference system) and be able to push the information out to all solutions in use so that >I can ensure that all guidance being followed in the field is using the latest approved guidance from WHO

name.value: Must have the ability to store images or other unstructured data

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – general Must have the ability to store images or other unstructured data

name.value: Neonate/infant/child (caregiver)

description.value: Actor Neonate/infant/child (caregiver) from Function Requirements

name.value: Notify a user if their account is locked due to wrong password attempts

description.value: *Category*: Security – authentication Notify a user if their account is locked due to wrong password attempts

name.value: Notify the user of a password change to their account

description.value: *Category*: Security – authentication Notify the user of a password change to their account

name.value: Notify the user to change their password the first time they log in

description.value: *Category*: Security – authentication Notify the user to change their password the first time they log in

name.value: Notify the user to regularly change the user's password

description.value: *Category*: Security – user management Notify the user to regularly change the user's password

name.value: Notify/send a reminder to the client's caregiver for the referral appointment

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Automated system notification, I want to: >Notify/send a reminder to the client's caregiver for the referral appointment so that >So that the caregiver does not forget the appointment to receive the required health services

name.value: Notify/send a reminder to the client's caregiver for the referral appointment

description.value: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Automated system notification, I want to: >Notify/send a reminder to the client's caregiver for the referral appointment so that >So that the caregiver does not forget the appointment to receive the required health services

name.value: Prevent remembering username and password

description.value: *Category*: Security – confidentiality Prevent remembering username and password

name.value: Produce a range of prepared and ad hoc reports and analyses

description.value: *Business process* (F) Aggregate Reporting: As a Facility staff, facility staff in charge, district health officer/staff, I want to: >Produce a range of prepared and ad hoc reports and analyses  so that >I am able to use data collected at the facility, including data for service delivery (beyond reporting purposes alone)

name.value: Provide a list of emergency referral locations and contact details if local emergency number (e.g. 911/999) is not used

description.value: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide a list of emergency referral locations and contact details if local emergency number (e.g. 911/999) is not used so that >I can arrange emergency services

name.value: Provide a list of follow-up location options and contact details

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Provide a list of follow-up location options and contact details so that >I can choose the best options for the client and schedule a follow-up

name.value: Provide a list of referral location options, specialisms and contact details

description.value: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Provide a list of referral location options, specialisms and contact details so that >I can choose the best options for the client's contact facility and schedule a referral

name.value: Provide a list of scheduled contacts and to allow for defaulters to be traced

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Community health worker, I want to: >Provide a list of scheduled contacts and to allow for defaulters to be traced so that >I can track and follow up clients requiring services

name.value: Provide a list of scheduled contacts to allow for defaulters to be traced

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Provide a list of scheduled contacts to allow for defaulters to be traced so that >I can track and follow up clients requiring services

name.value: Provide a list of tests that the health worker can order

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide a list of tests that the health worker can order so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

name.value: Provide a list of tests that the health worker can order for the client based on guidance for their age/symptoms/diagnosis

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide a list of tests that the health worker can order for the client based on guidance for their age/symptoms/diagnosis so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

name.value: Provide a list or roster of all clients in the schedule

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Community health worker, I want to: >Provide a list or roster of all clients in the schedule so that >I can manage and follow up on clients requiring services

name.value: Provide a list or roster of all infant/child clients

description.value: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide a list or roster of all infant/child clients so that >I know which clients to follow up or are due for services

name.value: Provide a list or roster of all infant/child clients due to arrive

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Provide a list or roster of all infant/child clients due to arrive so that >I know which clients to follow up or are due for services

name.value: Provide a means to ensure confidentiality and privacy of personal health information

description.value: *Category*: Security – confidentiality Provide a means to ensure confidentiality and privacy of personal health information

name.value: Provide a mechanism to securely change a user's password

description.value: *Category*: Security – authentication Provide a mechanism to securely change a user's password

name.value: Provide a modular approach to the solution to accommodate variations required to make the solution country-specific, for example: - ability to use/not to use personal identifiers for registration - include a focus on symptoms/diagnosis that may appear in a country-susceptible manner (malaria, HIV) - treatment modules that may be available in the country/setting (e.g. oral only vs injections)

description.value: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Provide a modular approach to the solution to accommodate variations required to make the solution country-specific, for example: - ability to use/not to use personal identifiers for registration - include a focus on symptoms/diagnosis that may appear in a country-susceptible manner (malaria, HIV) - treatment modules that may be available in the country/setting (e.g. oral only vs injections) so that >The registration and consultation process includes what is more likely required without by-passing questions that are not required

name.value: Provide a source to access accurate health information

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Provide a source to access accurate health information so that >I can manage my client's health in my daily life

name.value: Provide a source to access accurate health information

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Provide a source to access accurate health information so that >I can manage my client's health in my daily life

name.value: Provide a standardized form for the entry of clinical data

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide a standardized form for the entry of clinical data so that >I can ensure the client's health information is recorded and up to date

name.value: Provide a standardized form for the entry of clinical data

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide a standardized form for the entry of clinical data so that >I can ensure the client's health information is recorded and up to date

name.value: Provide a standardized form for the entry of the client's profile

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide a standardized form for the entry of the client's profile so that >I can ensure the client's health information is recorded and up to date

name.value: Provide a standardized form for the entry of the clients profile

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide a standardized form for the entry of the clients profile so that >I can ensure the client's health information is recorded and up to date

name.value: Provide a unique version number for each revision

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – general Provide a unique version number for each revision

name.value: Provide a way for the client's caregiver to receive information messages in a way that ensures patient confidentiality

description.value: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Provide a way for the client's caregiver to receive information messages in a way that ensures patient confidentiality so that >I can manage my client's health in my daily life

name.value: Provide a way for the client's caregiver to receive information messages in a way that ensures patient confidentiality

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Provide a way for the client's caregiver to receive information messages in a way that ensures patient confidentiality so that >I can manage my client's health in my daily life

name.value: Provide a way to share sources for access accurate health information

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Provide a way to share sources for access accurate health information so that >I can manage my client's health in my daily life

name.value: Provide a way to share sources to access to accurate health information

description.value: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Provide a way to share sources to access to accurate health information so that >I can manage my client's health in my daily life

name.value: Provide ability for allowed users to view confidential data

description.value: *Category*: Security – confidentiality Provide ability for allowed users to view confidential data

name.value: Provide access to data through application programming interfaces to interface with other SMART guideline reference App solutions, incumbent solutions (e.g. registration systems) and reporting tools

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – interoperability Provide access to data through application programming interfaces to interface with other SMART guideline reference App solutions, incumbent solutions (e.g. registration systems) and reporting tools

name.value: Provide context-sensitive, real-time decision support in response to the entry of clinical data (alerts, advice, resources)

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Provide context-sensitive, real-time decision support in response to the entry of clinical data (alerts, advice, resources) so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

name.value: Provide encrypted communication between components

description.value: *Category*: Security – confidentiality Provide encrypted communication between components

name.value: Provide fields where test results that have been ordered can be recorded

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide fields where test results that have been ordered can be recorded so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

name.value: Provide guidance to the users to better support clinical guidelines and best clinical practices

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – usability Provide guidance to the users to better support clinical guidelines and best clinical practices

name.value: Provide information so that test results that have been ordered can be recorded

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide information so that test results that have been ordered can be recorded so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

name.value: Provide informative error messages and tooltips

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – usability Provide informative error messages and tooltips

name.value: Provide password-protected access for authorized users

description.value: *Category*: Security – confidentiality Provide password-protected access for authorized users

name.value: Provide real-time range checks and data integrity checks on data

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide real-time range checks and data integrity checks on data so that >I can ensure the entry of accurate information and reduce errors

name.value: Provide real-time range checks and data integrity checks on data

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide real-time range checks and data integrity checks on data so that >I can ensure the entry of accurate information and reduce errors

name.value: Provide role-based access

description.value: *Category*: Security – user management Provide role-based access

name.value: Provide role-based access to the system

description.value: *Category*: Security – authentication Provide role-based access to the system

name.value: Provide sufficient data to rule out that this client is already in the system

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Provide sufficient data to rule out that this client is already in the system so that >I can avoid duplicates

name.value: Provide the ability to "check in" for a scheduled contact

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Provide the ability to \"check in\" for a scheduled contact so that >I can initiate services at the follow-up contact

name.value: Provide tools to search, sort and filter the infant/child client database

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Provide tools to search, sort and filter the infant/child client database so that >I can manage and follow up on clients requiring services

name.value: Provide tools to search, sort and filter the infant/child database

description.value: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker, I want to: >Provide tools to search, sort and filter the infant/child database so that >I can manage and follow up on clients requiring services

name.value: Provide/print/share information/clinical guidance to the client's caregiver as relevant

description.value: *Business process* (D) Referral: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Provide/print/share information/clinical guidance to the client's caregiver as relevant so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

name.value: Provide/print/share information/clinical guidance with the client's caregiver as relevant

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Provide/print/share information/clinical guidance with the client's caregiver as relevant so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

name.value: Provision of design, build, technical system and architecture, and testing documentation for future support and further configuration of the solution for other health intervention initiatives

description.value: *Category*: Documentation Provision of design, build, technical system and architecture, and testing documentation for future support and further configuration of the solution for other health intervention initiatives

name.value: Read client identification system (e.g. quick response [QR] code, barcode, fingerprint) and pull up client information

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Read client identification system (e.g. quick response [QR] code, barcode, fingerprint) and pull up client information so that >I can confirm that it is the correct client and update information as necessary

name.value: Receive information messages in a way that ensures patient confidentiality

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Receive information messages in a way that ensures patient confidentiality so that >I can manage my client's health in my daily life

name.value: Receive information messages/alerts in a way that ensures patient confidentiality

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Receive information messages/alerts in a way that ensures patient confidentiality so that >I can manage my client's health in my daily life

name.value: Record a time/date-stamped new contact (encounter)

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Record a time/date-stamped new contact (encounter) so that >I can confirm when the client came

name.value: Record all authentication violations

description.value: *Category*: Security – audit trail and logs Record all authentication violations

name.value: Record identification and tracking information (such as mobile phone number)

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Record identification and tracking information (such as mobile phone number) so that >I can follow up and remind the client on when to return for services

name.value: Record identification and tracking information (such as mobile phone number)

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Facility health worker, I want to: >Record identification and tracking information (such as mobile phone number) so that >I can follow up and remind the client on when to return for services

name.value: Refer to Business Process A: Registration

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Refer to Business Process A: Registration so that >I can register attendance of the follow-up

name.value: Refer to Business Process A: Registration

description.value: *Business process* (E) Follow-up: As a Community health worker, I want to: >Refer to Business Process A: Registration so that >I can identify the correct client details and health records

name.value: Report version number when saving data to the database

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – general Report version number when saving data to the database

name.value: Require a user to search if a client is already in the system before starting a new medical record entry

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Require a user to search if a client is already in the system before starting a new medical record entry so that >I can confirm that it is the correct client and update information as necessary

name.value: Reset a user's password in a secure manner

description.value: *Category*: Security – authentication Reset a user's password in a secure manner

name.value: Scalable to accommodate new demands

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – scalability Scalable to accommodate new demands

name.value: Search if the client is already in system (using at least two identifiers) (including information pertaining to the client's caregiver)

description.value: *Business process* (A) Registration: As a Health worker or clerk, I want to: >Search if the client is already in system (using at least two identifiers) (including information pertaining to the client's caregiver) so that >I can check if this is a new or existing client

name.value: Show the number of records that are not yet synchronized

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – general Show the number of records that are not yet synchronized

name.value: Simplify data recording through predefined dropdown or searchable lists, radio buttons and check boxes

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – usability Simplify data recording through predefined dropdown or searchable lists, radio buttons and check boxes

name.value: Solution must be able to leverage the data dictionary (to be produced as part of workstream 2/3 work)

description.value: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >Solution must be able to leverage the data dictionary (to be produced as part of workstream 2/3 work) so that >The tool is consistent

name.value: Suggest appropriate treatments/investigations based on findings

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Suggest appropriate treatments/investigations based on findings so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

name.value: Suggest appropriate treatments/investigations based on findings including the ability to propose alternative treatments in the case that the primary treatment is not available

description.value: *Business process* (C) Treat the child: As a Health worker and neonate/infant/child (caregiver), I want to: >Suggest appropriate treatments/investigations based on findings including the ability to propose alternative treatments in the case that the primary treatment is not available so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

name.value: Support definitions of unlimited roles and assigned levels of access, viewing, entry, editing and auditing

description.value: *Category*: Security – user management Support definitions of unlimited roles and assigned levels of access, viewing, entry, editing and auditing

name.value: Support multiple languages – English, French, Spanish, Chinese, Russian, Arabic

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – usability Support multiple languages – English, French, Spanish, Chinese, Russian, Arabic

name.value: Support real-time data entry validation and feedback to prevent data entry errors from being recorded

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – usability Support real-time data entry validation and feedback to prevent data entry errors from being recorded

name.value: The reference application must have an FHIR back end/FHIR native and leverage the workstream 3 content (CQL + FHIR resources)

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – interoperability The reference application must have an FHIR back end/FHIR native and leverage the workstream 3 content (CQL + FHIR resources)

name.value: The solution to represent data in an FHIR format that can be synced with client applications that use the FHIR international patient summary (IPS) on their mobile devices

description.value: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >The solution to represent data in an FHIR format that can be synced with client applications that use the FHIR international patient summary (IPS) on their mobile devices so that >To ensure that clients are able to access their personal records and keep a copy on their phones using the Health Level 7 IPS format.

name.value: The solution to store data in an FHIR-compliant server

description.value: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >The solution to store data in an FHIR-compliant server so that >Consistency of data representation and ability to exchange data with other services and solutions using FHIR standards and common value sets (International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems, Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes)

name.value: The solution to support multi-media, such as video, photos and audio

description.value: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >The solution to support multi-media, such as video, photos and audio so that >Examples of symptoms, diagnosis and treatment may be used throughout the consultation process

name.value: The solution to sync data in an FHIR-compliant server

description.value: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >The solution to sync data in an FHIR-compliant server so that >Ensure that data are stored and synced with a server, so that patient information relevant to another user of Child Health in Emergencies Digital Platform can access information for client history and to maintain continuity in care delivery

name.value: To be able to add data and calculations as well as forms to the reference application, for localization (language support) and adaptation (addition of core health and data content), as well as calculations for decision-support and populating indicators

description.value: *Business process* (G) Triage and Emergency Assessment: As a All Users, I want to: >To be able to add data and calculations as well as forms to the reference application, for localization (language support) and adaptation (addition of core health and data content), as well as calculations for decision-support and populating indicators so that >The tool and embedded forms (and associated interventions) can be adapted and localized by the user's governments/WHO/partners without requiring the assistance of engineers from the vendor each time

name.value: To be able to agree/disagree with the diagnosis presented from the guidance and be able to select an alternative diagnosis stating the reasoning regarding the decision

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to agree/disagree with the diagnosis presented from the guidance and be able to select an alternative diagnosis stating the reasoning regarding the decision so that >If a diagnosis is deemed incorrect that I can correct it with suitable reasoning to ensure that the correct treatment recommendations are provided

name.value: To be able to agree/disagree with the diagnosis presented from the guidance and be able to select an alternative diagnosis stating the reasoning regarding the decision

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to agree/disagree with the diagnosis presented from the guidance and be able to select an alternative diagnosis stating the reasoning regarding the decision so that >If a diagnosis is deemed incorrect that I can correct it with suitable reasoning to ensure that the correct treatment recommendations are provided

name.value: To be able to choose the option of a consultation that leads me through the full process to assess and classify the sick child and further to treat the child, referral and follow-up

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to choose the option of a consultation that leads me through the full process to assess and classify the sick child and further to treat the child, referral and follow-up so that >I can ensure that a complete consultation is provided

name.value: To be able to choose the option to refer in general to the SMART guidance without having to complete a full consultation (e.g. for training/reference only)

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to choose the option to refer in general to the SMART guidance without having to complete a full consultation (e.g. for training/reference only) so that >I can refresh my training and knowledge

name.value: To be able to follow a consultation that focuses initially on the symptoms highlighted by the caregiver but that continues a full assessment of all possible symptoms

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to follow a consultation that focuses initially on the symptoms highlighted by the caregiver but that continues a full assessment of all possible symptoms so that >I can provide a complete consultation and identify if there is more than one diagnosis and treatment recommendation

name.value: To be able to follow a consultation that focuses initially on the symptoms highlighted by the caregiver but that continues a full assessment of all possible symptoms

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to follow a consultation that focuses initially on the symptoms highlighted by the caregiver but that continues a full assessment of all possible symptoms so that >I can provide a complete consultation and identify if there is more than one diagnosis and treatment recommendation

name.value: To be able to route the consultation via different health workers and save the information already entered to the consultation, even if the consultation is not yet complete, enabling other health workers to see the information already entered and to be able to add/edit information as it becomes available

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to route the consultation via different health workers and save the information already entered to the consultation, even if the consultation is not yet complete, enabling other health workers to see the information already entered and to be able to add/edit information as it becomes available so that >I do not have to start a new consultation for every health worker that the client is involved with

name.value: To be able to route the consultation via different health workers and save the information already entered to the consultation, even if the consultation is not yet complete, enabling other health workers to see the information already entered and to be able to add/edit information as it becomes available.

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to route the consultation via different health workers and save the information already entered to the consultation, even if the consultation is not yet complete, enabling other health workers to see the information already entered and to be able to add/edit information as it becomes available. so that >I do not have to start a new consultation for every health worker that the client is involved with

name.value: Use industry-standard user interface practices and apply them in a consistent manner throughout the system

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – usability Use industry-standard user interface practices and apply them in a consistent manner throughout the system

name.value: View a review of any past medical history previously entered

description.value: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >View a review of any past medical history previously entered so that >I can provide appropriate services according to the latest clinical protocols

name.value: Warn user if no valid back-up for more than a predefined number of days

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – general Warn user if no valid back-up for more than a predefined number of days

name.value: Work in an environment that is subject to loss of connectivity

description.value: *Category*: System requirements – general Work in an environment that is subject to loss of connectivity
